review: Gave one to my mother and she loves it.  So I bought this one as a gift for someone who currently connects their laptop (which feeds off their phone's hotspot) to their TV with an HDMI cable.  Figured we could do away with all that using the Chromecast and their Android phone.  Nope.  Regardless what you read online, this unit NEEDS WiFi (at least for the initial setup).  Returned.
author: F. D. Walz Jr.
